{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21806v1", "title": "The embedding space of a Hopf link", "summary": "We study the unparametrised smooth embedding space of a Hopf link in
$\mathbb{R}^3$, and prove that it is homotopy equivalent to the closed
3-manifold $S^3/\mathbb{Q}_8$. As an intermediate step in the proof, we show
that the inclusion of the subspace of round embeddings is a homotopy
equivalence. We provide analogous results for the unparametrised smooth
embedding space of a Hopf link in $S^3$.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT", "published": "2025-04-30T17:08:27Z"}
